title: Bug 28035Different callback behavior on Windows and Mac with Combo widget
description: Bug 28035Different callback behavior on Windows and Mac with Combo widget
OB: I will attach the test class.On windows, org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Combo.setText(String) fires a modifyTextcallback to the registered modify listeners.The callback does not occur on Mac OSX.
SR: I will attach the test class.On windows, org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Combo.setText(String) fires a modifyTextcallback to the registered modify listeners.The callback does not occur on Mac OSX.
